data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Northern will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern, Zambia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Northern.

data.section_summary: On average, 62 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Northern, Zambia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Northern, Zambia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 54,088 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gujarati people.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Northern that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Northern with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Northern
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Northern
location.people_groups_list: Totela, Mbowe, Toka, Arab, Lebanese, Swahili, Congo
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Totela (2,100), Mbowe (800), Toka (28,000), Arab, Lebanese (3,800), Swahili, Congo (44,000)
